title: NFL ATL: Week 2 Preview
itunes:title: NFL ATL: Week 2 Preview
description:
A room full of heroes, Gregg Rosenthal, Dan Hanzus, Marc Sessler and Chris Wesseling dive in and give you a preview of all the action coming up in Week 2. The crew also gives you its hero picks and preps you for next week’s listening party. Join the conversation on Twitter: @NFL_ATL or #NFLATL .

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
